entries.translated: 导出自定义类型为 CSS

entries.source: Export a CSS snippet for custom callout types.
entries.translated: 导出一个 CSS 代码片段以自定义提示类型。
导出自定义类型为 JSON

entries.source: Choose custom types to export as a JSON file that you can then share with other users.
entries.translated: 选择自定义类型导出为JSON文件，然后可以与其他用户共享。

entries.source: Use CSS Snippet for Custom Callouts
entries.translated: 使用 CSS 代码片段自定义提示框

entries.source: Instead of managing it internally, Admonitions will maintain a CSS snippet to enable your custom types for callouts.
entries.translated: Admonitions 将维护一个 CSS 代码片段，以便启用您的自定义类型呼叫提示。

entries.source: Add a new Admonition type. All custom Admonitions will also be usable as callouts.
entries.translated: 添加一个新的提示类型。所有自定义提示也将可用作注目。

entries.source: Import admonitions from a JSON definition.
entries.translated: 从 JSON 定义导入提示信息。

entries.source: A drop shadow will be added to admonitions.
entries.translated: 将在提示信息框添加阴影。

entries.source: All admonitions & callouts will be collapsible by default. Use
entries.translated: 所有的 admonitions 和 callouts 将默认可折叠。使用

entries.source: Add a 'copy content' button to admonitions & callouts.
entries.translated: 为提示和侧边栏添加一个“复制内容”按钮。

entries.source: Admonition 名称将以 markdown 形式呈现。
entries.translated: Admonition 名称将以 markdown 形式呈现。

entries.source: Disable this setting to turn off admonition coloring by default. Can be overridden in the admonition definition.
entries.translated: 禁用此设置可默认关闭警告框着色。可以在警告框定义中覆盖此设置。

entries.source: Any admonition that does not have content inside it will be hidden.
entries.translated: 任何没有内容的提示都将被隐藏。
使用 Font Awesome 图标

entries.source: Font Awesome Free icons will be available in the item picker. Existing Admonitions defined using Font Awesome icons will continue to work.
entries.translated: Font Awesome 免费图标将在项目选择器中可用。已使用 Font Awesome 图标定义的警告框将继续生效。

entries.source: Load an additional icon pack. This requires an internet connection.
entries.translated: 加载额外的图标包。这需要互联网连接。

entries.source: Obsidian 0.14 has introduced Callout boxes to its core functionality using the same syntax as the Microsoft Document callouts.
entries.translated: Obsidian 0.14使用与Microsoft文档标注相同的语法将标注框引入其核心功能。

entries.source: This has rendered the Microsoft Document syntax for Admonitions obsolete, but Admonitions can still be used to create and manage your custom callout types.
entries.translated: 这使得用于Admonitions的Microsoft Document语法过时，但Admonitions仍然可以用于创建和管理自定义标注类型。

entries.source: Your existing code block Admonitions will always work!
entries.translated: 您现有的代码块Admonitions将始终有效！

entries.source: modify notes. Use at your own risk and please make backups.
entries.translated: 修改笔记。使用风险自负，请进行备份。

entries.source: With large vaults, this could take awhile!
entries.translated: 对于大型库，这可能需要一段时间！
